wikipedia_page.main: Johnny Loughrey (20 July 1945 – 13 April 2005) was a Northern Irish singer and songwriter born in Newtownstewart, County Tyrone. With his mix of country songs, Irish ballads and easy listening music, he achieved success in both England and Ireland. Johnny's son Shaun Loughrey is also a Country and Irish singer.

response: * Johnny Loughrey, Irish singer born in Newtownstewart in 1945, died in 2005.
*Johnny Loughrey (1945–2005), Northern Irish singer and songwriter
